header.modelsIndexed: models indexed and ready to be searched

aboutUs.title: A 3D Model Community Built For You
aboutUs.body: We created Thangs for one reason: our community members. With powerful search, collaboration tools, model sharing and unlimited storage, we are the fastest growing 3D community.

search.title: Powerful search
search.summary: Search over 1 million models to find the perfect 3D model for your project. Upload your own model and do a geometric search to find similar models.

storage.title: Unlimited Storage
storage.summary: Upload as many models as you want to Thangs. Share your models with the entire community or choose to keep them private with free, unlimited model storage.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.summary: Invite your friends and work together on projects. Easily keep track of changes with model version controls.

errors.pattern: Please enter model name without special characters ('/')

errors.required: Please select a primary model for your assembly
